00065     enum flags
00066     {
00067         Unknown         =  -1,
00068         None            =   0,
00069         Overwrite       =   1, 
00070         Recursive       =   2,
00071         Dereference     =   4,
00072         Create          =   8,
00073         Exclusive       =  16,
00074         Lock            =  32,
00075         CreateParents   =  64,
00076         // 128, reserved for Truncate
00077         // 256,  reserved for Append 
00078         Read            = 512,
00079         Write           = 1024,
00080         ReadWrite       = Read | Write
00081         // 2048, reserved for Binary
00082     };
